name: Agram Invest Inc
overview:
Agram Invest Inc. is an investment funds management company, founded in late 2007. Management style features are commitment, thorough research, experience in asset management, corporate finance and investments in emerging markets. The company is a part of the biggest financial group in the region - Agram Concern with revenues amounting to aprox. 900M USD.

Their focus is on southeast European markets where they manage four investment funds with aprox. 100M HRK assets under management. The funds clients consist mainly of institutional investors like banks and insurance companies.
